snippet: Brittney Griner had eight blocked shots, a W.N.B.A. playoff record, setting the tone for a dominant Phoenix performance as the Mercury routed the visiting Chicago Sky, 83-62.
abstract: Phoenix Mercury defeats Chicago Sky, 83-62, in Game 1 of WNBA finals; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brittney Griner had eight blocked shots, a W.N.B.A. playoff record, setting the tone for a dominant Phoenix performance as the Mercury routed the visiting Chicago Sky, 83-62.
